ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedule I.1 of that Act
PrecisOrder AMENDING SCHEDULE I.1 OF THE FINANCIAL ADMINISTRATION ACT by striking out the reference to the President of the Queen's Privy Council for Canada and substituting for the Minister of Infrastructure and Communities as the appropriate Minister with respect to the OFFICE OF THE COMMISSIONER OF OFFICIAL LANGUAGES.
